name: Home Energy Assessment
description: $200 rebate for professional home energy assessment; includes score and report about potential upgrades and savings
fullDescription: BayREN offers rebates for professional home energy assessments, providing homeowners with a comprehensive score and report identifying upgrades that can reduce energy costs.
whatTheyOffer:
- $200 rebate for energy assessment
- Professional in-home evaluation
- Home Energy Score (1-10 rating)
- Detailed report of improvement opportunities
- Cost and savings estimates
- Prioritized upgrade recommendations
- Helps plan home electrification
howToGetIt:
1. Find a BayREN-qualified assessor on website
2. Schedule in-home energy assessment
3. Assessor evaluates home and provides score
4. Receive detailed report with recommendations
5. Submit rebate application with assessment receipt
6. Receive $200 rebate
keywords: BayREN, home energy score, energy assessment, $200 rebate, energy audit, home evaluation, efficiency report, electrification planning
